Coding - Debug: I have a bug in my code. The code is: [paste code]. The error message is: [error message].
Writing - Blog Post: Write a blog post about [topic]. Target audience: [audience].
Writing - Email: Write a professional email to [recipient] about [subject]. Tone: [formal/casual].
Learning - Explanation: Explain [complex topic] in simple terms for beginners.
Creative - Story: Write a short story about [topic]. Genre: [genre].
